title: In Arabic By Arabs For Arabs
content:

comments.content:
Shukran Aziz for sharing this blog site. It has many participants, but also a lot of fonts lifting!

-Saad

Aziz, I forgot to ask you about your thread tite:

Why is it "By Arabs For Arabs"? I appreciate the first part "In Arabic", but I think the following part is neither true nor necessary!

-Saad

For Arabs is hidden in Graphics4arab.com?!  
Graphics4arab welcomes no-Arabs but Typophile is a better place.  
Happy Font-lifting with Flowers
